definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal
grain/granule/classifier for small round things (peas, bullets, peanuts, pills, grains etc)

sentences.english: We could, of course, distinguish finer-grained responsibilities, but this is rarely useful.
sentences.chinese: 当然，我们能够识别出细粒度的职责，但这很少有用。

sentences.english: In this sense photons differ very much from little grains or bullets of matter .
sentences.chinese: 在这个意义上，光子大大不同于物质的细粒或小丸。

sentences.english: The process provides an effective way of dressing for fine-grained wolframites.
sentences.chinese: 该工艺为细粒黑钨矿的选矿提供了有效途径。

sentences.english: Experimental study on mineral process of fine particle gold ore was carried on.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要对微细粒金矿石进行了选矿试验研究。

sentences.english: Soak oak mushrooms in water until soften, dice.
sentences.chinese: 将冬菇浸软，然后切成细粒。

sentences.english: Use sharing to support large numbers of fine-grained objects efficiently.
sentences.chinese: 运用分享技巧顶事扶持众多细粒度的对象。

sentences.english: Those business applications are designed with fine-grained business functions.
sentences.chinese: 这些业务应用程序都设计有细粒度的业务功能。

sentences.english: Experimental study on mineral processing of fine particle gold ore was carried out.
sentences.chinese: 主要对微细粒金矿石进行了选矿试验研究。

sentences.english: The fine-grained diorite enclaves in granites and their host rocks come from the same magma source.
sentences.chinese: 花岗岩中的细粒闪长质包体与寄主岩石属于同源岩浆。

sentences.english: The Stumbling blocks are the low settling rate and difficult dewatering of fine-grained mill tailing.
sentences.chinese: 其难度在于细粒级尾砂的沉降速度慢和脱水困难。

sentences.english: Design fine-grained class hierarchy and coarse-grained database tables.
sentences.chinese: 设计细粒度的类层次和粗粒度的数据表。

sentences.english: Elimination of the interference of slimes is the key in the flotation of finlegnained hematite ores.
sentences.chinese: 排除矿泥的干扰，是浮选细粒红铁矿石成功的关键。

sentences.english: The dispersion and flocculation behaviours of extremely fine talc in aqueous medium are described in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 研究了微细粒滑石在水介质中的分散与聚团行为。

sentences.english: The ore-hosting Yaojia Formation is composed of a set of braided stream medium-fine grained sediments.
sentences.chinese: 姚家组为一套中细粒辫状河流沉积。

sentences.english: The fine-grained soils, including peat and clay, are widely distributed in the city of Shantou, Guangdong.
sentences.chinese: 广东汕头市区广泛分布饱水细粒土包括淤泥和粘土。

sentences.english: This thread supports fine-grain parallelism, actually, it is a" stateless " thread.
sentences.chinese: 该线程支持细粒度并行，实际上是一种无状态的线程。

definition: aggregate (sand or gravel used in concrete 混凝土)
